title: buying first runes
body: i have 10000 ip and i want to buy my first runes could someone help me with just a general ad and a general ap page thanks

replies.body:
You need to do two things here man..

1. Ignore everyone here - look at there profiles, none of them are diamond or challenger (including myself).

2. Go to probuilds and look at what the pros are doing, easy...

http://www.probuilds.net/

Good luck

AD quints and magic pen marks are core for their classes respectively.

scale mr glyphs pretty standard.

i like scaling armor over flat seals since they nerfed flat.

move speed quints are the best runes in the game.

For mine

AP 
Quints- AP 
Yellow- Armour
Blue- MR
Red- Ap

AD
Quints- ad
Yellow- Armour
Blue- MR
Red- AD

This way you only have to buy different quints, and different marks. You can keep your seals and glyphs the same for both pages to reduce costs until you save up more.
WHY WOULD YOU BUY AP MARKS, IT MAKES ME CRINGE

AD: AD Marks, Armour Seals, Magic Resist Glyphs, AD Quintessences
AP: Magic Pen Marks, Health Seals, Scaling AP Glyphs, AP Quintessences
so many decent rune combinations but yeah just go with what above has said, and once your more in depth with your gameplay muck around with them to which suit you best

Classic AD: AD Marks, Armour Seals, Magic Resist Glyphs, AD Quints

Classic AP: Magic Pen Marks, Armour Seals, Magic Resist Hlyphs, AP Quints

ADC: AD Marks, Armour Seals, Magic Resist Glyphs, Attack Speed Quints

You can, if you want, swap the armour seals for HP seals, but its up to you. I prefer armour.

I use Glyphs of Armour, Seals of Magic Resist and Marks/Quints of Armour/Magic Penetration though you can instead use flat AD/AP for Marks/Quints. There's probably something people use Quints for other than flat AD/AP or penetration as well.
